entries.result: Introduction – meet the situation and set expectations.
Discovery – the party uncovers a clue, secret or resource.
Travel – movement between locations with potential events.
Conflict – confrontation with an obstacle, foe or dilemma.
Reveal – something hidden becomes known and shifts the story.
Interlude – downtime, rest or light social interaction.
Decision – the party makes a consequential choice.
Complication – an unexpected twist complicates the current plan.
Chase – pursue or be pursued through challenging terrain.
Negotiation – bargaining, diplomacy or persuasion is central.
Investigation – gather information, examine evidence and deduce.
Puzzle – solve a riddle, code or mechanical device.
Exploration – map unknown areas and catalogue features.
Contest – compete in a game, duel or skill challenge.
Boon – receive aid, treasure or a helpful contact.
Bane – suffer setback, injury or loss.
Transformation – character arc or location undergoes change.
Flashback – revisit a past event to inform current events.
Foreshadowing – hint at future events or threats.
Resolution – wrap up a thread, resolve conflict or close a chapter.
